question: Which country has been named the best country to visit in 2018, according to Lonely Planet 'Best in Travel 2018' list?
explanation: Chile has been named the best country to visit in 2018 by Lonely Planet in its \'Best in Travel 2018\' list and is followed by South Korea, Portugal, Djibouti and New Zealand. Apart from this, Belfast and the Causeway coast of Northern Ireland has been named by Lonely Planet as the best region to visit in 2018, while Seville of Spain has been named as best city to visit in 2018.
